title: I have some questions for the people who are outraged at the PAX riot event
body:
1. Did you go to PAX West this year? 

2. Were you planning to attend PAX West for the specific purpose of going to the Riot panel, but decided not to because of the males can't enter the women panel? 

3. How would you have planned the event differently if you had the opportunity to do so? 

4. What's your favorite food? 

5. Do you still play League of Legends or Watch League of Legends content? 

https://i.imgur.com/P2CsU1D.png[]
